subject: Order #SSN5801
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,
I've made an order #SSN5801 more than a week ago and it was only
partially shipped.
I ordered a handbrake and pedals however only the handbrake was shipped.
When the pedals will be shipped as well.

Best
Dimitar Nenov

conversations.body_text: Hi Dimitar Nenov,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hi,
Thanks.
I already received the handbrake. Any news when the pedals and haptics will
be shipped.

Best
Dimitar

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 8:01 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Dimitar Nenov,  ​It has been found that your order has been shipped in two packages. You have already received the handbrake. As for the pedal and haptic device in the other package, due to the impact of heavy snow in Europe on the goods we sent to the German warehouse, road congestion and delivery delays have occurred. It is expected to be shipped around the 22nd. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. If you have any questions, we will give priority to answering them for you.

Many thanks for the support.

Best
Dimitar

On Mon, Jan 19, 2026 at 10:16 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Dimitar Nenov,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.Wish you a pleasant day.
